Some women have more 
severe	incontinence	and	find

When to get help
In many cases incontinence 
is curable, so if you have a 
problem talk to your midwife, 
doctor or health visitor.
You can also get help and 
support from the Bladder 
and Bowel Community at 
www.bladderandbowel.org
